abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Brazil", "TaxonKey is Velloziaceae" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Colección de plantas vasculares del herbario de la Universitat de València (VAL) 1 records from Herbarium (UNA) 1 records from MAR - Herbário do Maranhão 1 records from Lund Botanical Museum (LD) 1 records from University of Florida Herbarium (FLAS) 1 records from University of Michigan Herbarium 1 records from Herbarium specimens of Université de Montpellier 2, Institut de Botanique (MPU)) 1 records from MPUC - Herbário do Museu da Pontifícia Universidade Católica do Rio Grande do Sul 1 records from PEUFR - Herbário Professor Vasconcelos Sobrinho 1 records from Questagame weekly feed 1 records from Sammlung Ernst Ule sinenumero Herbarium Hamburgense HBG 1 records from Herbarium Erlangense 1 records from Colección de Nymphaeales, Ophioglossales, Oxalidales, Pandanales, Pinales y Piperales del Museo Botánico CORD - IMBIV 1 records from Canadian Museum of Nature Palynology Collection 1 records from Bioversity Collecting Mission Database 2 records from EURISCO, The European Genetic Resources Search Catalogue 2 records from BRBA herbarium - Universidade Federal do Oeste da Bahia - Herbário Virtual Reflora 2 records from Colección de Herbario 2 records from DAV - UC Davis Herbarium 2 records from Occurrences in SinBIOTA 2 records from MFS - Herbário Profª.
